column1: '''Marjorie Jean Burns''' (b. [[1940]]) is an English professor at [[wikipedia:Portland State University|Portland State University]] in [[wikipedia:Portland
Her Ph.D. is from [[wikipedia:University of California
column2: Berkeley|UC Berkeley]] and focuses on the nineteenth-century British novel. She has been on the faculty of Portland State University for over thirty years
column3: where she teaches courses on nineteenth-century British literature
column6: and more. She has lectured on Tolkien throughout the United States
